page.title: 15TRANSPORT.
page.content: Although the Northampton to Rugby main railway line runs between Harlestone,Althorp and Church Brampton, there are no longer any stations.The stop at Althorp(once used by Queen Victoria) has been closed and the goods yard(owned by the Spencers) rented to industry.The nearest station is at Long Buckby and Northampton. The 594-6 bus services serve Lower Harlestone and Althorp but there are few buses to Upper Harlestone and only one service(Wednesday morning returning same evening) runs to Church Brampton.A school bus service serves all the above villages conveying children to middle and secondary schools. There are no car hire services in Althorp, Harlestone or Church Brampton.
